caption:
Notice The Nurses: ERNEST GRANT

Continuing our series of notable nurses is Ernest Grant, the first Black male to graduate with a PhD in Nursing from UNC Greensboro. 

Driven by a lifelong passion for fire safety and prevention, he volunteered at New York Presbyterian Hospital’s Burn Center following the attacks on the World Trade Center on September 11th, helping to care for those who were injured. 

In 2018, he became the first Black male to serve as president of the American Nurses Association.

#NoticeTheNurses #BlackHistoryMonth
